title: Project X (1987) Matthew Broderick (Can a chimp fly a plane)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0093793/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0093793/</a>

Charming story with a very young Matthew Broderick (then 25) about chimpanzees used in the mysterious "Project X".

PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS NOT MY RIP. Quality is not impressive. Never trust a ripper who cannot even fill the 700 MiB. But it is complete, it is playable, synch is OK, and it runs in both my standalone DivX players.

Several attempts have been made to upload this film here. One torrent has run dry of seeders, one more recent was corrupt and was deleted by the uploader. So I found this working torrent on another site and post it here for you who have become anxious to see the film.

If it attracts enough interest, I'll order the DVD and make a quality rip.

Widescreen, although this rip has been incorrectly masked and may challenge your display ratio options. Sound is good stereo.
